titles.title: To reauthorize tuition assistance programs under the District of Columbia College Access Act of 1999.
To reauthorize tuition assistance programs under the District of Columbia College Access Act of 1999.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: This bill reauthorizes through FY2023 the tuition assistance program that provides high school graduates from the District of Columbia the benefits of in-state tuition at institutions of higher education outside the District.
